demo.x509.net.ldap

Class SimpleLdapSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo.x509.net.ldap.SimpleLdapSearch

  • public class SimpleLdapSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class demonstrates how to use the IAIK-JCE LdapURLConnection implementation for searching an LDAP directory for certificates, attribute certificates and crls.
    For running this demo, the url, ca and subject names used by this example shall be replaced by real world ldap urls and ca/subject names.

    This demo uses LdapURLConnection which is based on the Java Naming and Directory Interface. For JDK versions <1.3 you will have to put jndi.jar, ldap.jar and providerutil.jar into your classpath which can be downloaded from the JNDI homepage at SUN: http://java.sun.com/products/jndi. JDK versions >=1.3 already have the JNDI included.

    See Also:
    URL, URLConnection, X509Certificate, AttributeCertificate, X509CRL, X509CRLStream, Handler, LdapURLStreamHandlerFactory, LdapURLConnection

    • Method Detail

      • searchForCertificates

        public void searchForCertificates()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Demonstrates how to use the IAIK-JCE LdapURLConnection implementation for searching an LDAP directory for certificates. The ldap host and entity cn names used in this example maybe replaced by real-world server and cn names.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when searching the ldap

      • searchForAttributeCertificates

        public void searchForAttributeCertificates()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Demonstrates how to use the IAIK-JCE LdapURLConnection implementation for searching an LDAP directory for attribute certificates. The ldap host and entity cn names used in this example maybe replaced by real-world server and cn names.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when searching the ldap

      • searchForCertificateRevocationList

        public void searchForCertificateRevocationList()
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Demonstrates how to use the IAIK-JCE LdapURLConnection implementation for searching an LDAP directory for some particular certificate revocation list referenced by the ldap url. The ldap url used in this example maybe replaced by a real-world url pointing to a crl on an ldap server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when searching the ldap

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method.
